title: shrI vishvanAtham
sahitya:
shrI vishvanAtham bhajE shrI vishAlAkSi sanAtham


anupallavi

  bhUvisrta vArANasi puravara sadanam sundara vadanam


caraNam    annapUrNEshvari prANEsham aga hara gangA tIra nivEsham
 prasannam alankrta kAshi nagaram shankaram haram shashi kalA dharam
 			(madhyama kAlam)
sarva jagan mangaLakara dIkSam sakala manuja kula krupA kaTAkSam
garvita kAla haram niTilAkSam kAla kaNDam ArUDa mahOkSam
